overview:
Senior Associate with Norwest Venture Partners

Amit Garg is currently at NVP (http://www.nvp.com), where he is focused on consumer web. NVP was founded in 1961, manages $3.7B, and its latest fund is $1.2B. Amit was previously a business analyst at Google for two years where he focused on AdWords, and two years as a Product Manager focusing on internationalization and Google Images.

Amit did his undergraduate from Stanford in 2003 in Computer Science and Biology, masters in Biomedical Informations also from Stanford in 2004, and a MBA from Harvard in 2010. He is passionate about technology, healthcare, entrepreneurship and non-profits. Some organizations he has started include http://excell.stanford.edu, http://www.bookbox.com, http://www.i-shoe.net and http://www.hospitalforhope.org.

Amit was born and raised in Brazil, has deep roots in India, currently lives in the States, and dabbles in many things, from languages to salsa to exploring the world.
